name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ticker: A Minimal Clock for Your New Tab Page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tidy little clock for your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Declutter your Chrome with a minimal clock on your new tab page. Ticker only does one thing: displays a clock. No fussing with configuration or finding the right colors; just the time.
